article: An old tiger lives in the forest. He seldom goes to look for food himself. He orders other animals to  _  him something to eat. One day he sees a monkey and says, " I'm  _  , Monkey. Go to the village and bring me a fat pig." "Oh, Tiger," says the monkey. " I  _  do that. There  _  another tiger over there. He also wants a fat pig. He will not let me do anything  _  you. I am afraid of him." "What?" cries the tiger. "Show  _  that tiger. I will talk to him." "Come  _  me, then." Says the monkey. The monkey and the tiger get to a bridge above the river. "Now look down  _  the river." Says the monkey. "Do you  see  the head, the white teeth and large green eyes of a tiger?" "Yes, I do," cries the old tiger. "I will eat him up." With these words the tiger  jumps into  the river.
